txt.en: Wanted: Elegant Scales\n\nThe dwarves of the mining expedition have requested a collection of elegant scales.
This collection box is checked daily by the dwarves. Your collection is sure to reach the requesting party.
The dwarves of the mining expedition have requested a collection of elegant scales.
Collect elegant scales and drop them in a collection box ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collection boxes for this task can be found in the major hubs of Moria.\n\nYou should bring the trophies you gathered to a collection box.
